alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 9:35PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Schuyler and Chemung Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 934 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Big Flats, or near West Elmira, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elmira, Southport, Big Flats, Horseheads, Elmira Heights, Erin, Cayuta, Millport, West Elmira and Lockwood. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 49 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
